1.content: John was a handsome man. He was liked by his peers and by many women. He had a good job and a good house and a good car and all kinds of other good things. He thought this stuff could make him happy, keep him safe, and make everyone like him! John was wrong! Not everyone liked John. He was a member of the papparazzi. He was one of the best in the world! Celebrities did not like John. John made them angry and he knew it, but he thought no one could touch him because he was rich. Well one day John was at a party full of celebrities! He was taking all kinds of pictures of different stars! He knew this gig was going to rake in the dough, but he didn't know that four celebrities were watching him from the ooposite side of the room. Which celebrities were watching him?

11.content:
Miley Cyrus, Ali Lohan, Paris Hilton, and Jessica Alba were watching John's every move from the other side of the dance floor. Each one of them had been photographed by the infamous John, and they didn't like him. Tonight was the night they would get their revenge. They had been planning this for a long time, and now it was finally time to put their plan into action! Jessica walked over to John and tapped him on the shoulder.

"Oh hey Jessica!" said John with a grin.
"How about you come over to my place," she said with a wink.

111.content:
John tried not to look too excited. He tried to keep his cool.
"Sure that sounds great. I'll meet you there," he said with a grin.
Jessica walked back over to Miley, Ali, and Paris to remind them of the plan.
"Okay we gotta get to my house before he does," she told them.
"Okay, do you have the stuff?" asked Miley.
"Yeah it's at my house. Now let's go!" ordered Jessica.
The four celebrities got in Jessica's car and drove as fast as they could to her house. They arrived before John and went inside.
"Where is it?" asked Paris.
"It's on that table," said Jessica.
Paris reached over and picked up a container full of some kind of liquid. The girls gathered around it with excitement. They were finally going to get their revenge! Suddenly the doorbell rang. They looked out the window and saw John standing there. Jessica slowly opened the door, but before he could come inside she poured the liquid all over him! All four of them began to laugh with joy. John looked at the four girls and realized they were getting bigger and bigger. He looked around and noticed they were not getting bigger, he was getting smaller! The liquid they poured on him had made him...

14.content:
John had spent the entire night dancing, drinking, and taking photos of all the celebrity girls he could find. It was getting late in the evening and he was thoroughly enamored, and a small group of girls on the opposite side of the club had noticed this and, seeing as they utterly loathed John, decided to take action. The girls were Lindsay Lohan, her sister Ali Lohan, Britney Spears, and her sister Jamie Lynn Spears.

The four of them had come across some shady contracts and under-the-counter deals to get ahold of their weapon of choice, but they were confident in its potency. Britney, the oldest of the four, removed the small vial from her purse, she was to make the drop.

She walked idly over to John, standing at the bar as usual, chatting with a group of girls that clearly didn't enjoy his company. She approached him, "Hey, John, how are you doin tonight?" John grinned, "I'm doing just fine, *hiccup*, how abou' you, pretty lady? Can I take your picture...ma'am?" Britney stepped back a ways, trying to hide the cringe on her face from the foul odor of alcohol rising from her suitor. "No, no thanks. I was just stopping by to see how you were doing. you look like you're having fun. Can I get you something to drink, John?"

You were completely fine with idea of havnig another drink, despite already being totally wasted. I mean, what the fuck, it was Friday night, what were you supposed to be doing? You accepted in your typical, wavering voice, "Yeah...that'd be great. I love you, Britney." Britney just forced a smile, "Yep. Okay then, John. Ah, here's your drink." She took the glass and, while you were oogling some random babe's butt as she walked by, slipped the potion into your drink.

She looked up at you and passed the drink. "Have anice night, John. I'll be seeing you later." You smiled, completely unaware of what that might encounter was going to entail."
14.title: Lohans and Spears at the Club

141.content:
John drank the entire glass in one big gulp. He licked his lips and continued dancing with various women. In about 15 minutes he began feeling dizzy. Everything looked a little bit bigger. John ran into the bathroom to see if he needed to puke, but he went into the wrong bathroom. He walked right into the womens' restroom and was greeted by Britney, Jaime Lynn, Lindsay, and Ali. Each one of them with a huge smile on their face.

"Actually you look more like you're shrinking!" laughed Ali.
The four girls began to giggle at this while John continued to get smaller and more confused. This continued for about 5 minutes until John was about 3 inches tall.

1411.content:
"You can't escape John!" laughed Lindsay.
Lindsay picked up John by the collar of his shirt and looked down at him sitting in the palm of her hand. She began to smile. She loved having so much power!
"We can do whatever we want with you now!" laughed Britney.
"Yeah! You're a helpless little bug!" giggled Jaime Lynn.
"Let's put him in my sister's shoe," said Lindsay.
Lindsay placed John in her sister's hand. Ali squeezed John's small body with her massive hand as tight as she could. Then she slowly slipped her foot from her shoe and stuck John in the shoe. John took one last look at the laughing girls before Ali's foot blocked his one exit and left him alone in the darkness of her shoe.
"What are they gonna do with me?" asked John to himself.


Suddenly John was blinded by a bright light. He looked up and noticed no one was near him. He was sitting by himself in a giant apartment. He guessed the apartment belonged to the Lohan family or the Spears family. He looked around him once more. He was still alone. He decided to take advantage of this moment. He was going to make an escape! He ran to the nearest door he saw as fast as his little legs could go, but he didn't get far because....

John ran as fast as he could toward the giant wooden door. He was about to make it! He was going to be free! John was inches away from the door when suddenly Ali and Jaime Lynn burst through the door. They walked inside the room and giggled while they talked to each other. He thought maybe they would believe it. He heard loud stomps slowly coming toward him. He opened his eye as much as he could without being noticed by the giant girls. He saw two pairs of bare feet coming straight toward him. Then he heard this:
"Hey! What happened to John?" asked Jaime Lynn.
"Is he dead?" asked Ali.

142.content:
As Britney turned and walked away from you, in your drunken state you mistake her as being interested in you. You pick up the drink she gave you and decide to follow her across the club. Britney sat down in a booth and turned to her friends. As you get closer you identify Lindsay Lohan as the other woman. Lohan spots you coming towards them and informs Britney. Britney turns and sees the drink still in your hand so invites you to sit down with them. Your hardly going to say no, are you?

As John stumbled into the seat beside Britney, she rolls her eyes as Lindsay. Britney feints interest in you until you finish the drink at which point Lindsay whispers into Britney's ear. The two celebrities laugh and Britney tells you to follow them for some fun. John manages to follow Britney and Lindsay across the club and into the female toilets. John is feeling light-headed now and struggles to walk in a straight line. John makes his way into the toilet and is greeted by Ali Lohan and Jamie Lynn Spears. Lindsay Lohan slams the door shut behind you as Britney comes over to you and looks you in the eye. After a few seconds she smiles as you begin to have to tilt your head to look at her.

Several minutes pass before you stop shrinking. Completely helpless you turn to the door but Lindsay is pressed up against it and laughing at what has happened. Jamie Lynn grabs John by the head and lifts him up to face. Jamie Lynn explains to John that they are responsible for his sudden change in size. Ali decides to jump in and tells John that this is simply payback for all the torment he has caused them. Ali says they are doing this for the entire female population who hate perverts like John. John protests his innocence but Britney grabs him in her hand and squeezes tightly. Jamie Lynn lets go of Johns head as her sister takes over.

Lindsay asks how are they going to get John out of there and back to their apartment without him being seen. Ali points out that the place is surrounded by the media. Jamie asks Britney when was the last time she changed her shoes. Britney says she cant remember but they are still in good condition. Lindsay sees where it is going and asks Britney to take off one of her shoes. Britney does so and hands it to Lindsay. Lindsay raises it to her nose and takes a sniff. Lindsay's face scrunches up in disgust before saying its perfect. Britney now realises where Jamie is going and drops the helpless John into her shoe.

John hits the insole and is immediately overcome by the disgusting aroma of feet, leather and sweat. Britney pulls her shoe back on and wiggles her toes to make John suffer some more. The four ladies exit the club and head to their next destination.
142.title: You pick the drink up and follow Britney.
